summary: A tiny little camp set just outside Riverwood for those marksman types.
descriptionHtml:
A small tent set outside Riverwood as a low-level house with no purchase or a roleplaying camp for those hunters and archers inside us.
 There is armor set in the tent which can be considered cheating depending on your level!
 I use it as a level 13 and have found better armor, but just a warning for you hardcore Skyrim users.
 Armor stats are as follows. Cuirass - 45% More Damage to Archery, Gloves - moves more silently, Boots - Increased Carryweight, Hood - 25% more damage to Archery.

UPDATE 2.0
Amazing total overhaul of the old mod. Brand new safehouse one of the now THREE tents. One is the Daedra worship of the old witch who was butchered here, the other has enchanting table, and the 3rd has the secret entrance. Almost all crafting stations included.

NOT FOR PLAYERS WHO WANT FANCY HOUSES
author: boxrocks
